summary.span: 提供一些类型和成员，使你能够创建由 Windows (ETW) 的事件跟踪捕获的强类型事件。

span.span: Provides types and members that enable you to create strongly typed events to be captured by event tracing for Windows (ETW).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 强类型事件由名称标识并包含负载说明。A strongly typed event is identified by name and contains payload descriptions. 可以通过使用反射来发现程序可以生成的事件列表。You can discover the list of events that a program can produce by using reflection.
